statements: UPDATE Paintings SET painting_name = 'Starry Night', painting_artist = 'Vincent van Gogh' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Paintings SET painting_year = 1913, restoration_history = 'Cleaned and restored in 2019' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE Paintings SET restoration_history = 'Underwent major restoration in 2020', condition_report = 'Excellent condition' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Paintings SET condition_report = 'Slight wear and tear' WHERE painting_artist = 'Van Gogh';
UPDATE painting SET painting_name='Starry Night', artist_name='Vincent van Gogh' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE restoration SET treatment_description='Cleaning and varnishing' , restorer_name='Kate Smith' WHERE painting_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE painting SET painting_name='Starry Night', creation_year=1889, condition_report='Excellent condition' WHERE id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE restoration SET treatment_description='Cleaned and varnished the painting', restoration_date='2022-07-15', restorer_name='John Doe' WHERE painting_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE paintings SET artist='Van Gogh', year_created=1889 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE restoration_logs SET restoration_details='Cleaned and varnished the painting' WHERE log_id=3;
UPDATE paintings SET restoration_history = 'Extensive repairs and touch-ups were done on the painting.', condition_report = 'Overall good condition with minor wear and tear.' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE restoration_logs SET restoration_details = 'Paint layer consolidation and varnish removal were performed during the restoration.', restorer = 'Jane Doe' WHERE log_id = 3;
UPDATE Paintings SET creation_year = 1900 WHERE painting_id = 1;
UPDATE Restoration SET restoration_cost = 5000.00, restoration_date = '2023-05-15' WHERE restoration_id = 3;
UPDATE Paintings SET painting_name = 'Mona Lisa', artist_name = 'Leonardo da Vinci' WHERE painting_id = 1;
UPDATE Restoration SET restoration_cost = 5000.00, restoration_description = 'Extensive cleaning and repair' WHERE restoration_id = 3;
